titleStmt.title: The picture of Christ The wonder of meditation, the earnest of eternitie, the touchstone of faith: or, A counterbuffe to despaire. Gathered from the great fountaine, and store house of liuing waters, the most ancient, sacred, holy, authenticall selfe-assuring, and canonicall scriptures, of the old and new testament.
titleStmt.author: I. H., fl. 1611.

notesStmt.note: "Of the perfection of the Scriptures" which has caption title, begins new pagination and register.
Identified as STC 14560 on UMI microfilm, reel 1313.
Reproductions of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Appears at reel 1313 and at reel 1519 (both are Bodleian copy).
